clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Describe Treatment Patterns and Outcomes in EGFRm NSCLC Patients in Belgium
clinical_study.official_title: REtrospective, obserVational Study to Describe the Treatment Patterns and Outcomes of Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Mutant (EGFRm) Locally Advanced or Metastatic Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients in Belgium

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective, observational, multicentre study to evaluate treatment patterns and outcomes of patients diagnosed with locally advanced or metastatic EGFRm NSCLC in Belgium

primary_outcome.measure: demographic characteristics of patients diagnosed between 1 September 2015 and 31 December 2017
NSCLC characteristics at diagnosis between 1 september 2015 and 31 December 2017
NSCLC disease characteristics at start of 2L or 3L treatment during observation window
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statitistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

primary_outcome.measure: Type of treatment received during 1L, 2L or 3L treatment during the observation window
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statitistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

primary_outcome.measure: Time on treatment during 1L, 2L or 3L treatment during the observation window
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statitistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients receiving a definitive, systemic therapy for NSCLC or no definitive, systemic therapy for NSCLC/best supportive care treatment after progression on their previous therapy
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statitistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

primary_outcome.measure: Reason for discontinuation after 1L, 2L or 3L treatment during observation window
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off, 1 september 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

primary_outcome.measure: EGFR testing characteristics at diagnosis between 1 september 2015 and 31 December 2017
EGFR testing characteristics after progression on previous treatment
primary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off, 01 September 2018 until end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Descriptive statistics will be used to analyse these endpoints.

secondary_outcome.measure: PFS for 1L, 2L or 3L treatment during the observation window
secondary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Kaplan-Meier analysis will be used.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-to-treatment discontinuation for 1L, 2L and 3L treatment during the observation window
secondary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Kaplan-Meier analysis will be used.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to start of subsequent treatment after 1L and 2L treatment during the observation window
secondary_outcome.description: observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Kaplan-Meier analysis will be used.

OS will be measured overall for all EGFRm NSCLC patients and depending on receipt of Osimertinib treatment and line of Osimertinib treatment. observation window: between date of diagnosis until the data cut-off , 01 September 2018, end of clinical activity or death, whichever comes first. Kaplan-Meier analysis will be used.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with EGFR mutation positive NSCLC

intervention.arm_group_label: Patients with EGFR mutation positive NSCLC
Patients with EGFR mutation positive NSCLC
Patients with EGFR mutation positive NSCLC

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients diagnosed with advanced or metastatic EGFRm NSCLC between 1 september 2015 and 31 December 2017

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female, aged at least 18 years
- Pathologically confirmed NSCLC
- Tumour harbours a mutation of EGFR
- Diagnosis (radiologically or pathologically confirmed) of locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC, not amenable to curative surgery or chemoradiotherapy between 01 September 2015 and 31 December 2017
Exclusion Criteria:
- No follow-up data available after diagnosis of locally advanced or metastatic EGFRm NSCLC
- Patients who objected to participation to the study
